fixed_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 66.5/70.7/74.9% of Attack. Chance to inflict 1 Curse stack on foes.
fixed_skill.name: Maeigaon

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 40.8/42.8/44.9% of Attack. 3.4/3.6/3.7% chance to inflict Dizzy for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Flash Bomb

innate_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes equal to 43.5/45.7/47.8% of Attack, ignoring their defense.
innate_skill.name: Megidolaon

innate_skill.desc: Increase critical rate of ranged attacks by 7.2%.
innate_skill.name: Trigger Happy III

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 21.2%. When using a skill, increase user's Attack by 10%, based on number of Curse stacks inflicted on foes (max 5).
passive_skill.name: Herald of Famine

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 21.2%. When using a skill, increase user's Attack by 11.4%, based on number of Curse stacks inflicted on foes (max 5).
passive_skill.name: Herald of Famine I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 21.2%. When using a skill, increase user's Attack by 12.7%, based on number of Curse stacks inflicted on foes (max 5).
passive_skill.name: Herald of Famine II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 21.2%. When using a skill, increase user's Attack by 14%, based on number of Curse stacks inflicted on foes (max 5).
passive_skill.name: Herald of Famine III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
